tool.label: Run single Line
tool.callback: currentEditor = matlab.desktop.editor.getActive; originalSelection = currentEditor.Selection; assert(originalSelection(1)==originalSelection(3));%Check that multiple lines are not selected currentEditor.Selection = [originalSelection(1) 1 originalSelection(1) Inf];%Select the whole line eval(currentEditor.SelectedText);%Run the whole line currentEditor.Selection = originalSelection;%Reset selection to original state clear currentEditor originalselection

tool.label: save figure
tool.callback: % save *.png of current figure dt = datestr(now,'yyyy-mm-dd_HHMMSS'); export_fig([dt, '.png'], '-nocrop') clear dt
